ingredients: 6. 1 medium red onion, chopped ( the yellow ones will do too)
7. 1-2 Hot green chili (Like Thai Bird) – (Optional – use it if you want it spicy)
9. 1 inch piece of ginger, peeled and diced
11. 1/2 Teaspoon  Red Chili Powder or cayenne (Optional)
13. 1 Cup of diced or crushed tomatoes (fresh or canned)
